title: Australian diary. No. 050
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: a self-taught sculptor makes Aborigines the subject of his work; a Child Welfare Centre is a boon in New Guinea; plastic bowls show they run true to form and a history of duelling through the ages is shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
